	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

The Insecticons watched the explosion. Ransack slowly lowered his shield. T=
he Insecticons in the back move up near Ransack. Venom points in different =
directions and makes hand signals. The Insecticons split up about 15 feet f=
rom each other. Barrage aims a rather large gun at the base and fires a gre=
nade. It will explode on impact. It hurtles towards the Chivtron Chivtron b=
ase as the Insecticons watch anxiously...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
=
  From: Airshadow Nightlight 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesd=
ay, February 13, 2002 1:25 AM
  Subject: Re: Insecticons. Can you dig it, C=
hivtrons?...


   Nighlight/Trinity:: 

  Nightlight fell with the explotio=
n, trinity huged Aerotaur altought the little one didn't like admit it that=
 explotion scared her. 

    Narrator <thecode@...> wrote: 

    Th=
e Insecticons stand before the Chivtron base. Some western music plays. In =
fact, it's Clint Eastwood music. Barrage is reloading his huge rifle slowly=
, putting in one exploding shell at a time. His eyes are on his work, not t=
he base. Chop Shop was kneeling down and moving a finger slowly back and fo=
rth through the dirt on the ground, drawing a picture of something that did=
n't look like anything. Shrapnel and Bombshell were bickering about grenade=
s, it was indistinct, as they were in the background while the camera focus=
ed on Kickback, who was kicking a rock around with his hind legs in beast m=
ode. Ransack, meanwhile, was holding a square shaped bomb in his palm. He s=
lowly raised his hand, and pressed the button. He threw the charge. It land=
ed on (or next to) the Chivtron base. The timer started counting down towar=
ds zero one second at a time. Ransack stands, in a pose, and watches the ti=
mer tick down as he backs away a few steps. He raises a shield i! n front o=
f himself to shield himself from any shrapnel. No, not my character, the de=
bris from explosions, and stuff.

    Venom: Take cover, Insecticons.

    =
The Insecticons all back away, except for Ransack, who stood close and held=
 his shield up. Not close enough to be caught in the explosion, but alot cl=
oser than the other Insecticons were standing...

roups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
